name: AMAZING MOON-FROG IN SPACE
description:
Welcome to the Moon! Explore new planets beyond the Earth!


Earth is not the only planet in space. There's a lot of excitement waiting for you. It is a very special experience to jump on the spacecraft and the moon. Try this unforgettable adventure you too! Don’t be surprised, it's likely that you did not just get to the Moon’s surface with a spaceship. There is another ship. Maybe you are not alone. Walk around, be careful and prudent, not sure everyone is as friendly as you are!


Features:
-funny gravity
-space environment
-easy control
